QueryResult.text: SELECT ex.from_currency_code, ex.to_currency_code , CASE WHEN calctype.NAME = 'Divide' THEN 1 / ex.rate ELSE ex.rate END rate , calctype.NAME calculation_method, ratetype.NAME rate_type , ex.from_date FROM cmn_exchange_rates ex , cmn_lookups_v ratetype, cmn_lookups_v calctype WHERE ex.rate_type = ratetype.lookup_code AND ratetype.lookup_type = 'CMN_EXCHANGE_RATE_TYPE' AND ratetype.language_code = 'en' AND ex.calculation_method = calctype.lookup_code AND calctype.lookup_type = 'CMN_CALC_METHOD_TYPE' AND calctype.language_code =ratetype.language_code
